biotools.summary: Tool for visualizing array CGH data and/or expression arrays onto chromosomal coordinates to allow for correlations between copy number and gene expression to be observed. It is included in the GEPAS package.

bioschemas.name: ISACGH
bioschemas.summary: Tool for visualizing array CGH data and/or expression arrays onto chromosomal coordinates to allow for correlations between copy number and gene expression to be observed. It is included in the GEPAS package.
